room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Bunker" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: An amazing escape room option in Miami! We did the Nuclear Bunker and then decided to do a second room right after (The Bank) because they were so fun! And we escaped from BOTH thank you very much. Our room supervisors Emily and Juan were both awesome! Definitely check this place out!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Bunker" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: These escape rooms here are so fun; I wish I could forget the rooms so I could do them over again. Nayib was really great as our helper. He helped, but not so much as to take the experience away from the players. I've done the Prison Break and the Bunker ones so far; both of them were great, and I can't wait for an excuse to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Bunker" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: An amazing escape room option in Miami! We did the Nuclear Bunker and then decided to do a second room right after (The Bank) because they were so fun! And we escaped from BOTH thank you very much. Our room supervisors Emily and Juan were both awesome! Deff check this place out!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Bunker" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: We always have a wonderful time and next we are ready to take on the Zombie room!

room_title: Escape room "Nuclear Bunker" by Room Escape Miami by Fox in a Box in Miami
review: Experience like no other. I played the nuclear bunker for the first time and it was surreal, we saved the world with 2 minutes to spare. Next, I'm definitely going back for prison break.
